hints.content: Each tick mark on the number line represents one minute.

$10{:}08$ is $8$ minutes after $10{:}00$. 



[[☃ image 1]]

So, we move $8$ tick marks past $10{:}00$.

options.alt: A number line labeled 0 to 60 with tick marks every 1 unit. The 0 tick mark is also labeled 10:00 and the 60 tick mark is also labeled 11:00. The eighth tick mark after 0 is labeled 10:08. A green line moves right along the number line from 10:00 to 10:08. !

hints.content:
This number line shows $10{:}08$ graphed:



[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 0 to 60 with tick marks every 1 unit. The 0 tick mark is also labeled 10:00 and the 60 tick mark is also labeled 11:00.  The eighth tick mark after 0 is labeled C. !

question.content:
**On which number line is $10{:}08$ graphed?**

[[☃ radio 1]]
